title: Funding Guide: Grants, Loans & Investor List
description:
It’s a handpicked, high-value directory of real funding opportunities you can apply for — whether you’re a startup founder, creative entrepreneur, NGO leader, or student innovator.

What You’ll Get:
✔️ A categorized list of 50+ up-to-date funding opportunities
✔️ Grants, business loans, startup accelerators, and pitch contests
✔️ Local (Nigeria/Africa) + international funders and investors
✔️ Direct application links and summary of requirements
